title: damage
description: Apply damage to the specified entities. See more in the [Damage Command documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsdamageintroduction).

fields.title: target
fields.description: Required. The target to damage. A player name or [target selector](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors).

fields.title: amount
fields.description: Required. Default `0`. An `integer` that specifies the amount of damage.

fields.title: cause
fields.description: Optional. Default `none`. An `enum` of the damage cause.

fields.title: damager
fields.description: A `selector` that specifies which entity will be treated as dealing the damage to the target. Should be one entity or player.

overloads.title: Damage with optional cause
overloads.description: Damage a target with an amount of damage. Optionally include a cause.

overloads.title: Damage with optional cause, entity, damager
overloads.description: Damage a target with an amount of damage. Optionally include a cause, entity, and damager.
